goal: Implement Monk class levels 1-3: Ki resource, Martial Arts, Ki abilities (Flurry/Patient Defense/Step of Wind), Unarmored Movement, Deflect Missiles

design.ki_architecture: Ki is a resource on Character (not a feature). Lives in Character.resources[ResourceKeyKi]. Features consume via char.GetResource(Ki).Use(n). Recovery handled by RecoverableResource subscribing to RestTopic.
design.consumption_pattern: feature.Activate() casts owner to *Character, calls GetResource(Ki).Use(amount)
design.recovery_pattern: LoadResourceData() creates RecoverableResource and calls Apply(ctx, bus) which subscribes to rest events

tasks.name: Martial Arts Condition
tasks.description: DEX for unarmed/monk weapons via AttackChain, scaling damage via DamageChain, isMonkWeapon helper

tasks.name: Flurry of Blows Feature
tasks.description: Consume 1 Ki, grant two bonus action unarmed strikes

tasks.name: Patient Defense Feature
tasks.description: Consume 1 Ki, apply Dodging condition (attackers have disadvantage)

tasks.name: Step of the Wind Feature
tasks.description: Consume 1 Ki, grant Disengage or Dash as bonus action

tasks.name: Unarmored Movement Condition
tasks.description: +10 ft speed when not wearing armor or shield

tasks.name: Deflect Missiles Feature
tasks.description: Reaction to reduce ranged weapon damage by 1d10 + DEX + monk level
